resources.string:
Amazing villa in Denia (Deveses Beach), Alicante, Spain; recently built with high quality materials (in 2008) and situated in a quiet area just 150 m from the beach. 

Its most important features are spacious sunny rooms and a 50 m2 pool in 600 m2 plot. 

Also, you have a parking for 2 cars, a double-height porch, a storage room and a water well. 

All windows and doors are protected with security bars and the plot is completely fenced in. 

Inside you have a lovely living room, a spacious kitchen, a downstairs complete bathroom, three double bedrooms and an amazing upstairs suite equipped with complete bathroom and a solarium overlooking the sea. 

Plot area: 6.458,3 ft2 (600 m2) 

Total floor area: 2.260,4 ft2 (210 m2) 

Pool area: 538,2 ft2 (50 m2) 

Building year: 2.008 

Distance from the beach: 490 ft (150 m) 

Rooms: 
- Spacious living-dining room 
- 3 double bedrooms 
- 1 suite bedroom with en-suite bathroom 
- 1 ground-floor bathroom 
- Kitchen with breakfast nook 
- Outdoors terraces, first-floor solarium and double-height porch 
- Outdoors joined building with barbeque, kitchen space, toilet, and storage room 

Amenities: 
- Parking for 2 cars 
- All windows and doors protected with security bars 
- Plot completely fenced in 
- Water well 

LOCATION: 
Camí Vell de Gandia a Denia 12-2, Denia, 03770, Alicante, Spain 

ASKING PRICE: £285,200 (340,000 €) 

CONTACT: 

Jose Puchol-Salort 

Tlf: 07597517562
Dreamy Mediterranean Villa in Denia, Spain. Property for sale with private pool and 600 sqm plot
